title: BBH's Scott Clemons: Optimistic on Personal Consumption (Audio)
itunes:title: BBH's Scott Clemons: Optimistic on Personal Consumption (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Scott Clemons, Chief Investment Strategist at Brown Brothers Harriman, on the U.S. and global markets,his investment outlook and the Fed.
